President: Ariel Klaas

Treasurer: Blake Gross
Secretary: Phoebe Clark
Reporter: Claire Bennett
Historian: Molly Fuller

Mission Statement: FBLA inspires and prepares students to become community-minded business leaders in a global society through relevant career preparation and leadership experiences.\n FBLAs program focuses on: Leadership Development, Academic Competitions, Educational Programs, Membership Benefits, Community Service, Awards & Recognition.
